description.raw:
* Revert style fixes for example program to make it easier to see what has changed

* move Simulate function closer to Constructor to make diff easier to read

This doesn't have to be merged, but I think it's valuable to be able to see what changes are needed when adapting an example to use ignition-physics. Compare to the source:

* https://github.com/dartsim/dart/blob/master/examples/osgExamples/osgOperationalSpaceControl/osgOperationalSpaceControl.cpp#L45-L107
